function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of demand in the economy due to the COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Economic downturn, high unemployment, and decreased consumer spending","Mitigation":"Stimulus packages, investment in infrastructure, and support for affected industries","Technologies":"Economic modeling software, financial forecasting tools, and policy analysis platforms","People":"Workers in affected industries, unemployed individuals, and consumers","Owner":"Government, economic policymakers, and industry leaders"},{"Description":"Exposure of irresponsible government policies and decline of industrial sectors","Impact":"Lack of essential medical equipment and technology due to decline in strategic industrial sectors","Mitigation":"Investment in strategic sectors, restructuring of industrial policies, and support for essential industries","Technologies":"Supply chain optimization software, advanced manufacturing technologies, and industrial modernization tools","People":"Healthcare workers, patients in need of medical equipment, and industrial workers","Owner":"Government, industrial leaders, and policy influencers"},{"Description":"Potential repetition of COVID-19 type events in the future","Impact":"Continued vulnerability to similar pandemics and global health crises","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure, research into infectious diseases, and development of pandemic response plans","Technologies":"Healthcare analytics tools, disease tracking systems, and vaccine development technologies","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable communities","Owner":"Government, global health organizations, and medical research institutions"}]}
